job_details.Functieomschrijving:
vcita is on the lookout for a dynamic Full-Stack Developer with a passion for cutting-edge technology! Are you excited about building solutions that empower small and medium businesses? If you're eager to develop solutions that make cutting-edge technology accessible and impactful, we want you!, * Architect and implement consumer-facing AI-powered features using Vue.js, Node.js and Typescript
     * Identify and implement creative approaches to overcome existing large language model (LLM) blind spots and weaknesses.
     * Develop scalable AI solutions that empower other teams and enhance overall business capabilities
     * Enhance our data infrastructure, including tools like Snowflake and Looker, to support data-driven products, including data pipelines and insights
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and deploy impactful features that advance business solutions.
     * Provide technical guidance and mentorship to development teams on AI/ML technologies and practices.
     * Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies.
job_details.full_text:
Full-Stack Developer

vcita is on the lookout for a dynamic Full-Stack Developer with a passion for cutting-edge technology! Are you excited about building solutions that empower small and medium businesses? If you're eager to develop solutions that make cutting-edge technology accessible and impactful, we want you!, * Architect and implement consumer-facing AI-powered features using Vue.js, Node.js and Typescript
     * Identify and implement creative approaches to overcome existing large language model (LLM) blind spots and weaknesses.
     * Develop scalable AI solutions that empower other teams and enhance overall business capabilities
     * Enhance our data infrastructure, including tools like Snowflake and Looker, to support data-driven products, including data pipelines and insights
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and deploy impactful features that advance business solutions.
     * Provide technical guidance and mentorship to development teams on AI/ML technologies and practices.
     * Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building consumer-facing AI-powered features, specifically mentioning LLMs and developing scalable AI solutions. It also highlights working with LLM frameworks and staying updated on AI advancements, aligning strongly with the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: Architect and implement consumer-facing AI-powered features using Vue.js, Node.js and Typescript
Develop scalable AI solutions that empower other teams and enhance overall business capabilities
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and deploy impactful features that advance business solutions.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the core activities of building and deploying software applications, integrating AI features, and working with development teams to deliver solutions.

phrases: Identify and implement creative approaches to overcome existing large language model (LLM) blind spots and weaknesses.
Provide technical guidance and mentorship to development teams on AI/ML technologies and practices.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves directly working with and improving LLMs, which falls under model adaptation and fine-tuning, a key aspect of generative AI modeling. Mentorship on AI/ML also points to modeling expertise.

phrases: Enhance our data infrastructure, including tools like Snowflake and Looker, to support data-driven products, including data pipelines and insights
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions enhancing data infrastructure, supporting data-driven products, and working with data pipelines, which are core components of data engineering.

phrases: Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to continuously learn and adapt to new developments in the fast-paced AI field.

skills: Identify and implement creative approaches to overcome existing large language model (LLM) blind spots and weaknesses.
Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies.
Architect and implement consumer-facing AI-powered features
